title: Interpretation of the sun in a dream: I saw the sun in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the rays of the sun in a dream for a girl, for a single woman, a pregnant woman for a married woman, a dream of sunlight, a dream of a bright sun, seeing the sun at night in a dream. The sun in interpretation is the greatest king, because it is the brightest of the celestial bodies, with its countless benefits, and the sun shows the kingship of the country that has appeared In which the vision, and the sun in a dream, shows the power and influence of the dreamer, and the sun in a married woman’s dream indicates the husband. The sun is also a worthy woman, like the wives of kings and presidents, and the sun in general in a man’s sleep is his mother, daughter, or wife. In the Arabic blog, the poet compares the charm and beauty of women to the bright sun. It was narrated that the sun appeared in a dream of the Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, to refer to his mother, and it was said in the interpretations: Rather, it was his paternal aunt, his father’s wife, and her name was his grandmother, and it was said: Rather, like his father Jacob, peace be upon him, and the moon in that dream refers to his mother. The interpretation of a dream about the sun depends on its pronunciation. If the word is feminine, it means a woman, and if the masculine word means a man and a boy. The sun falling to the ground in a dream. As for seeing the sun in dreams falling to the ground, or being swallowed by a great bird like an eagle, or falling into the sea, or It is burned by fire, or its yellow eye disappears, or it becomes very black, or it is gone. outside his orbit and path, or disappeared completely from the sky, or went into a coffin or grave. A righteous woman dies. Solar eclipse and its disappearance in a dream. If you see in your dream that the sun has been eclipsed, or that clouds are hiding it, or that fog, thick dust, or smoke is accumulating on it so that nothing can be seen, or you see it hovering in the sky without stability, then all of this indicates To an event or accident, it may be an illness or two. Or sadness, distress, or bad news, unless the signifier is sick while awake, then the interpretation here is not appropriate. Black Sun in a Dream As for someone who sees in his dream as if the sun suddenly blackened or darkened without an eclipse, then this dream indicates great injustice, injustice, and corruption on earth or Blasphemy, haste and error. Whoever takes the sun in his hand or right, or feels in a dream as if he owns it, or sees the sun in his lap, or sees it illuminating the house or the road, this indicates power and status. Which the fortuneteller had not accepted before, and this may indicate the birth of a pregnant woman. To catch the sun and take it in a dream. As for whoever sees in his dream that he ignited the sun and put it in his clothes or in his pocket or kept it in a bowl, box, or cupboard, then he will marry a woman with a dress or an older woman. And beauty. If the dreamer is married, his wife gave birth in that year, and her child was an imam, scholar, or ruler. If the sun rises from the west in a dream, if you see the sun rising from the west, or returning after sunset, or returning from the place from which it rises, then a sign or Lesson. Perhaps the dream suggests that the dreamer has withdrawn from something he intended, namely travel, marriage, buying or selling. It was also said in this dream that it indicates a decline in the patient’s illness. Or the death of the fetus in the pregnant woman’s womb. Or the return of the traveler and the warrior with spoils and money, or the return of the prisoner to his prison after his release, or it is a return

title: Interpretation of a dream about birds and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about birds in a dream and its meaning. Seeing birds in a dream is good, because it indicates many different meanings, for both men and women. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that the sound of birds in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates an imminent marriage, and for a married woman, it indicates the stability of her marital life in material and psychological terms. Through this article, we learn about the different interpretations of seeing birds. In a dream, as narrated by scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen.Read more: Backgrounds in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about birds in a dream and its meaningAs we mentioned previously, there are many interpretations of seeing birds in a dream, and we will then explain the interpretation of seeing birds according to Imam Ibn Sirin, which is as follows:• Ibn Sirin says It will be seen that seeing birds in a dream bodes well for the pioneer in the coming period.• If the dreamer sees in a dream that he sees a group of birds, this means that he will gain profits and money if he engages in trade.• If the dreamer sees a bird escaping or dying in a dream, this indicates The death of the dreamer’s son. It also indicates the loss of business and trade. Read more: Interpretation of seeing a frog in a dreamInterpretation of seeing colored birdsAlso, after we learned about the interpretation of seeing a dream about birds in a dream and its meaning, we will refer to the following interpretation of seeing colored birds in a dream through The following interpretation: Colored birds in a married man’s dream indicate the happiness and stability in which the dreamer lives with his wife. If the dreamer sees a group of colorful birds in a dream, this indicates a lot of money from a lawful source. It also indicates goodness and blessings for the monarch in the coming period. A married woman who has a gray bird in a dream indicates good news, such as an upcoming pregnancy. Seeing a colorful bird in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will receive a promotion at work and pay off debts. A multi-colored bird in a dream also indicates optimism, love of goodness, and blessings for the pioneer. Read more: Piano in a dreamInterpretation of seeing birds pecking in a dreamAs we learned previously about the interpretation of seeing birds in a dream and its importance, we will then discuss the interpretation of seeing birds pecking in a dream through the following:The bird pecking on the dreamer’s hand indicates the weakness of the viewer’s character and his inability to make a decision A bird bite in a dream shows a man that some financial crises and problems will happen to the dreamer. Attacking a bird in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from major problems and severe distress. It also indicates the emergence of some family problems in the scenes. Tapping a bird in a dream indicates a nearby vulva. Read more: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing birds dying in a dream. The interpretation of seeing birds in a dream has many connotations, depending on the condition of the viewer, as well as the circumstances in which he lives. Below we explain the interpretation of seeing birds dying in a dream, which is as follows: The death of a bird in a dream indicates serious anguish and suffering that the dreamer is experiencing. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the bird is dying, this indicates that he has committed sins and sins.

title: Interpretation of a dream about desert in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the desert in a dream: We have many dreams and visions whose interpretation we want to know, and the interpretation of our dream today is the interpretation of seeing a dream about the desert in a dream in detail. We will learn about a married woman, an unmarried girl, and a pregnant woman, in addition to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this dream.Interpretation of a dream about the desert in a dream according to Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of seeing the same person in a dream in the empty desert, which is an indication of the severity of the pain that this person is experiencing Alone, without others standing by his side, and his empty life. They have no interest. When one sees sand in a dream, it is a sign of the sustenance and abundance in which that person lives, and everything that will come is good for him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If one sees water in the desert, this is a sign that this person is constantly experiencing good luck. Also, seeing a person in a dream in the desert, which is empty, with no water or people in it, is an indication that this person is facing some obstacles and problems in his life. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a desert in a dream in which there are scorpions, lizards, and snakes is a sign of hearing bad news, Perhaps some of the problems that a person is exposed to in his life are injustice and many pressures. The interpretation of a person who sees in a dream an empty desert in which he searches for something to lose but does not find is an indication of the difficulty of life and that he is looking for work but does not find it, and it may be the loss of some money. If a person dreams that he is wandering in the vast desert, then the vision of wandering is a sign of the stability in which that person lives and that his life will be blessed with great wealth. Interpretation of seeing the desert in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is walking in the desert, this is a sign that Things will change for the better, and God knows best, and it may be a sign of the nearness of marriage. If an unmarried girl sees that she is walking in the desert, but she is riding on a horse, and that desert is full of water and palm trees, then this indicates marriage to someone who offers her everything that every girl desires except Good manners, and never abandons them. She is miserable in her life. If a single girl sees that she is walking in an empty place like a desert and there are insects, scorpions and snakes inside, then this is evidence of some problems that she faces or the presence of some people in her life who do not. They want her well and are trying to make her wrong. Interpretation of a dream about the desert in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is walking in the desert, this is evidence that some people are trying to come between her and her husband, especially if there are scorpions, lizards, and snakes trying to harm her. In a dream. If a married woman sees the desert in a dream, but it has water and plants, this is evidence of good news awaiting this woman, such as the money that she and her husband will receive. Pregnancy of a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the desert in a dream for a man. If a man sees in his dream that he is in the desert, but feels afraid, this is evidence of some problems he faces at work or some crises he faces and a lack of money. If he sees...

title: I dreamed that I was pregnant and I was not married

preview.html: The dream refers to the difficult tasks that this single girl performed in her previous life, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I was pregnant in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is pregnant without marriage and she is happy about it. Fidel indicates that she will reach a great achievement in her life. And things that she greatly desired. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is pregnant by her fiancé outside of marriage and becomes sad. It is an indication that he will achieve many things, which is what he wished and wanted to do. While an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is pregnant, and she was happy with her pregnancy, without Marriage in a dream. It shows that she will undertake many difficult tasks in her life and succeed. Likewise, if an unmarried woman discovers that she is pregnant in a dream, and she was not married and did not dream. Showing that she has completed many of the projects that she sees in her life and will succeed, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dreamInterpretation of following a dream that I am pregnant in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that she dreamed that she was pregnant and had never given birth before. It shows that instead of the great God she will see something that she wanted very much in her life. A married woman who dreams that she is pregnant and about to Giving birth in a dream is happy. It explains that she will live with an abundance of goodness and food in her life, God willing, and will be happy for it. A married woman looks at her pregnancy in a dream, and she was very surprised by it. This indicates that she has overcome many difficulties in her life and will achieve what she wants. And the dreamer who sees in the dream got married. She is pregnant with twins in the dream, and she was happy. A sign of her success in life and that she will stay away from troubles and troubles during this time. Interpretation of dreams is that I was pregnant when I was alone in a dream about a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that she is pregnant in a dream Without marrying an unknown man in the dream. It indicates a big problem that she will fall into at this time in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if the divorced woman looks at her stomach and sees that she is pregnant, and is surprised in the dream. It indicates that she will get into something now, and she will be very sad about it. And God knows best. A divorced woman seeing that she is pregnant in a dream is the result of her divorce, and she is very sad. A sign that she is desperately trying to return to him at this stage of her life. A divorced woman who sees that she is pregnant after her divorce with a familiar face in a dream announces that she will marry that person. The person she saw in the dream, and she lives happily with him. Read also: Seeing a woman I know pregnant in a dream about a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a woman pregnant while she is single in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees that the unmarried woman was pregnant without marrying him, and you know that in the dream. It indicates It indicates that he will be involved in a big problem in his life at this time and will be sad about it. Seeing the dreamer looking at a single woman in a dream who is pregnant outside of marriage. It indicates that he sees some crises in his life and in his daily life and is trying to overcome and eliminate them. The dreaming man who sees He tells him that the girl is not married

title: Interpretation of giving the living to the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the living giving to the dead? The interpretation of the living giving to the dead in a dream gives many meanings, knowing that the jurists said that sometimes a vision is promising and in other cases reprehensible, and in this article we will explain when is a dream benign? When is it annoying and full of evil? Continue to the following paragraphs.You have a dream that confuses you. Wait.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of the living person’s performance on dead coins. The jurists explained that if the dead person takes money, clothes, or food from the dreamer, the dream has two interpretations: The first explanation: The dead person’s need for charity and his desire to increase his good deeds; Because he needs someone to pray over him and remind him of righteousness so that God will remove his pain and torment from him. The second interpretation: The dreamer may lose a lot of money and may live sad in the next few days due to the death of a family member. The jurists said that if the dreamer was sick in reality and saw his deceased mother in a dream She takes a lot of money from him. The dream indicates that the father will die soon. If the deceased takes a group of coins in the dream immediately, this indicates a material loss that the dreamer will suffer suddenly, knowing that he will compensate for this lost money. As for whether the deceased takes coins From the dreamer from time to time, the vision indicates the successive losses that the dreamer experiences in his life, continuously or intermittently. However, if the deceased took rusty coins from the dreamer and gave him shiny, new coins and the dreamer was very happy with this thing in the dream, then the scene appears after the dreamer About something that almost hurt him, and God grant him. He has other things filled with blessings and goodness, and perhaps this vision indicates the fortuneteller’s resignation from his current job and going to another job filled with abundant forces. Explanation of giving the living to the dead by Ibn SirinWhen the deceased takes divine coins without inscriptions and gives him in a dream clearly engraved and identified coins, the dream may indicate Until the dreamer's life was bleak and hopeless, and God will grant him vitality, success, and the beginning of life. However, if the deceased asks the priest for money to buy food because he feels hungry, this is a sign that the deceased needs charity, and if the priest continues to give zakat to this deceased in reality, then the vision requires From him that. Increase these alms and multiply them because the dead person needs them, and wants to increase his good deeds in order to enjoy a measure of Paradise. When the dreamer sees that he gave coins to the dead, and after a short period in the dream the dreamer finds a treasure full of money, then the dream indicates an increase in money and an increase in his livelihood in this world because of his charity. On the soul of the dead in reality. Interpretation of the performance of the living on the dead coins for single people. If the dreamer had only one pound and gave it to the deceased in the dream, and she felt sad after he took it from her, this interprets that she has something in her life and will lose it, and this may be a job that she loved and will leave, or The lover who wanted to get married, but both of them will not marry and separate from each other. But if she dreams that she has a lot of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about cooked meat and broth

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cooked meat and broth One of the interpretations that many are looking for is the interpretation of a dream about cooked meat and broth, as the interpretation of the vision differs from one imam to another, and the vision differs according to the condition of the one who sees it, and varies from married to unmarried. One of the interpreters can say that the interpretation of seeing cooked meat and broth in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of all the enemies around him who are trying to harm him. Interpretation of a dream about cooked meat and broth by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen There are many interpretations of this interpretation of a dream about cooked meat and broth, some of which are good and some of which are bad, and we will mention that through the site Different. According to what Imam Al-Nabulsi interpreted, seeing a person in a dream eating cooked meat indicates an increase in his livelihood and an increase in his work as well. If the meat that the seer eats in his dream is spoiled meat, then his vision indicates that the seer will be exposed to a health problem and must be careful. A man eats meat in his dream, and camel meat was cooked, and his vision is a sign that he will receive great benefit from a king or president. When you eat cooked beef, this is evidence of a lack of livelihood and money and a lack of work. The imam interpreted Ibn Shaheen: Seeing minced meat in a dream is evidence of the dreamer's bright future and successful work, and that his situation will change for the better. Cutting meat in a dream into slices indicates that the dreamer will get rid of all his worries. When the dreamer sees in his dream that he is cutting meat inside his house, this vision shows the evil that will enter his house. Interpretation of dreams of cooked meat and broth for unmarried women An unmarried girl eating cooked meat in her dream indicates that she will get a new prestigious job and earn a lot of money from it. If the girl is a science student and sees herself eating lamb, her vision indicates that she excels in her studies and achieves the highest grades. Seeing a girl in a dream that she is eating meat in general, this vision indicates that this girl will marry a wealthy young man. When a girl sees in a dream that she is eating uncooked meat, this indicates that the girl is surrounded by many envious people and haters in her life. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream distributing raw meat to people, this vision indicates that this girl will get married, but this marriage will not be completed and divorce will occur soon. Interpretation of a dream about cooked meat and broth In the dream of an unmarried girl who suffers From problems and worries, this indicates that this girl will overcome them and get rid of all her problems and worries. Eating cooked meat in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is cooking meat for her family, the vision indicates that this woman lives a happy and satisfying life. When a married woman sees that she is offering her husband raw meat, this vision indicates that this woman says many harsh and insulting words to her husband. Seeing a wife cooking beef indicates the calm and comfort prevailing in her life, and cooking halal meat in a dream is a sign of peace of mind. If a married woman sees herself eating meat in a dream

Whoever sees that he is filling the cup in the dream his wife will become pregnant and will give birth, as the cup in the dream shows the dreamer’s condition and his worldly life according to the contents of the cup, and this will In this article, we explain. What is the interpretation of seeing a glass cup? Evidence of the clarity of some things that the viewer has overlooked. The interpretation of a dream about eating a cup in a dream expresses worry and anxiety. What is the interpretation of a girl who sees in a dream a cup full of water? An indicator of success and we wish you success. What does it mean to see a set of glasses in a row? Evidence of good luck for the dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing a cup filled with diamonds for a married woman? Evidence of imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a cup If you see yourself eating a cup in a dream, this indicates anxiety and sadness. Hence the vision The glass is evidence of the clarity of some things that the observer ignores. And the sick person who sees in a dream that he is drinking from a cup, this is an indication that his death is approaching. After that, seeing an empty cup in a dream is evidence of the presence of a stubborn and disobedient woman. Seeing a broken cup in a dream indicates problems and troubles. Which the dreamer is going through. Seeing an empty Nabulsi cup. Seeing an empty cup in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s emotional and mental emptiness. Then seeing a broken cup in a dream is good news for anxiety, problems, and sadness. An empty cup also indicates that the dreamer is looking for some useless things. After that Seeing a set of glasses in a row is a sign of good luck for the dreamer. Fresh water in a cup indicates safety and good luck. After that, to see yourself eating a cup in a dream can be an indication of the coming of problems and stress in life. A cup full of water denotes On good offspring and a sign of pregnancy for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a cup full of water for a single woman. A girl who sees a cup full of water in a dream is a sign of success and good luck. Then, seeing a cup in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of comfort and relief from distress. Seeing a cup is considered Full is a sign that the girl will be engaged soon. Seeing a cup in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman’s cup full of diamonds indicates the approaching pregnancy. Then, seeing an empty cup is evidence of the loneliness that the woman is experiencing, as it is evidence of a lack of livelihood. Interpretation of seeing a cup in a dream for a pregnant woman if she sees If a pregnant woman sees a broken cup in a dream, this is evidence that she will die during childbirth. Then seeing a pregnant woman with a cup full of wine will give birth to a female. Then seeing a pregnant woman dreaming of a cup full of juice is an indication that the child will be male. Interpretation of seeing a cup in a dream for a manIf a man sees a cup Filled with water in a dream, it means that his wife is pregnant. Seeing a man eating delicious juice from a cup indicates that he will earn a living from halal money. Then the man sees a cup filled with impure water, this indicates the problems and troubles he is going through. Then the young man who sees a cup Beautiful indicates the presence of a

title: Interpretation of a dream about milking an animal in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing animals being milked in a dream for a single woman, for married women, for pregnant women, for divorced men, for men, either milking a cow, milking from my chest, milking a buffalo, I dreamed of a dairy cow, I dreamed that I was milking a buffalo, drinking cow's milk, for Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Milking an animal in a dream. One of the most beautiful dreams that bring goodness and happiness to the dreamer in his dream, as milk is one of the things that all people should eat in public life, to reap the great benefit in it, and follow the dreamer's Sunnah. The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, who called on us to constantly consume dairy products because of the great benefits they bring us in all areas of the body, especially in building bones and others, but in the event of seeing milk in a dream, the dreamer begins to think a lot about the meaning of the vision in order to obtain the correct interpretation that we will explain to you as explained by the interpreter. Ibn Sirin in his interpretations Interpretation of a dream about an animal in a dream Milking an animal in a dream indicates good behavior, flattery, politics, and livelihood. In return for what he milks, if the slave sees that he is milking his master’s cow, he will marry his master’s wife. Whoever dreams of milking a cow and drinking its milk will be rich if he is poor, and he may boast and raise his status, and if he is rich, his wealth and dignity will increase. Whoever sees that he is milking a camel has taken money from the sultan, then milking with blood is forbidden money. And milking is interpreted as cunning, the work of camels in milking in the land of the Arabs. Milking a camel is a job in a non-Arab land. It was said: Whoever milks a camel and drinks its milk marries a righteous woman, and if he marries a son, he will be blessed. Interpretation of milking an animal in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing an animal being milked in a dream is evidence that the dreamer enjoys very good health in public life and will have kindness and recovery from any diseases. When milk falls to the ground in a dream, the dreamer will be exposed to many material losses. Seeing an animal being milked in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s blessing of livelihood and money in the near future, and seeing it in a farmer’s dream indicates an increase in his harvest and success. Seeing animal milk in a dream and it was fresh is evidence of the happy occasions coming to the people of the house. Seeing milk in a traveler’s dream also indicates success in the journey and getting what one desires and money as well. The dreamer sees that he is milking a cow to get milk, evidence of cunning and conspiracy in his life. Interpretation of camel milk in a dream Milking camels in a dream is evidence of marrying a righteous woman, and protecting her in public life, and drinking camel milk indicates the abundance of good that will come to the dreamer. Seeing a married man milking a camel in The dream is evidence that he will achieve marital happiness with his wife and will have wonderful children. Seeing a married woman milking a camel in her house is a sign of goodness and blessing coming to her home. Milking animals that do not give milk in reality is evidence that the dreamer will succeed in achieving many difficult things in his life and will obtain them after long suffering. Taking bird milk in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get some money in the near future

Milking animals that do not give milk in reality is evidence that the dreamer will succeed in achieving many difficult things in his life and will obtain them after long suffering. title: Finding a lost shoe in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: But every dream has its own details and we explain this in detail in today's article from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a lost shoe in a dream for a single girl An unmarried woman, when she dreams of seeing a lost shoe in a dream, and finds it difficult to find it, but she finds it in a dream. The dream shows that she is going through difficult things in her life that cause her great sadness, but she will pass through them, God willing. Seeing the loss of shoes in a dream for an unmarried girl is a metaphor for losing her hopes in life. But when a single girl dreams that she has found her lost shoe in a dream. It is better than this to be free from troubles, worries and sorrow, and God knows best. And if an unmarried girl dreams that she is wearing a shoe, she suddenly lost it, and she did not find it easily in the dream. This dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through something difficult for her in the current period of her life. And no one knows anything about it, so she feels constant tension, and God knows best. A vision of finding a lost shoe after a long search in a dream for an unmarried girl in a dream. A commendable vision, because it indicates that the dreamer will be freed from a certain crisis in his life, until she begins a comfortable stage, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation Seeing shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing finding a lost shoe in a dream for a married woman A married woman dreams that her husband gives her her shoe in a dream, but she lost it and could not find it after searching for it for a long time. This dream is bad and causes sadness and anxiety for the dreamer, because she is going through a period of sadness in her life, and God knows best. As for the married woman who dreamed that she found the lost shoe, and felt happy because of that in the dream. Here the dream indicates that she will end a big problem in her life that was difficult for her, and God knows best. And when a married woman sees that she is the one who lost the shoe intentionally, and did not want to search for it and find it again in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer is trying with all her might to get rid of a big problem in her life that causes her many problems, and God knows best. Seeing the loss of a shoe in a dream for a married woman is a metaphor for a big problem with her husband that she is desperate to solve, and God knows best. But if the married woman dreams that her husband helps her find her lost shoe in a dream. The dream indicates that the woman receives support and help from her husband to solve their problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing finding a lost shoe in a dream for a man and its meaning When a man dreams that he sees his shoe lost in a dream and He can do something or find it in a dream. This dream means that the dreamer suffers from a big problem in his life, and seeks to solve it and get rid of it in various ways, and God knows best. As for the man who sees himself searching for the lost shoe in a dream, and is able to find it quickly and in a short time in the dream. It indicates that the dreamer is facing a difficult problem in his life, but he did not continue and saw happiness and joy, and got rid of fatigue and misery, and God knows best. As for the man who sees himself finding the lost shoe in a dream, but it is in bad condition, torn and does not fit him. This dream means that the dreamer feels upset about something in reality
